TDR for US Shippers

End-to-End Duty Refund Solution for U.S. Shippers

Unlock hidden savings in your international eCommerce supply chain with our specialized duty and tax recovery services.

A Solution For Every Tariff Cost

Order Shipped

The order has left the warehouse to its international buyer.

Order Imported

Order is imported at its final destination and delivered to the buyer.

Customs Duties Are Charged to the Importer

Order Returned

The order was delivered to its European buyer. One or more items are returned.

Claim back European duties with our innovative TDR Europe Duty Drawback solution.

Trade Duty Refund claims import duties back.

Order re-imported in the US

The order is now back to the US, ready to be processed at the returns warehouse.

Import customs duties are due on returned goods

But TDR Duty-Free Returns to the US will get your goods back home at 0% Duties.

Make Europe B2C Returns Duty Free
